name: Git-clone-reset-tutorial
tagline: A ShutIt-based tutorial on git clone-reset.
body:
### Git clone-reset Tutorial
This is that

### Install and run

```
# install docker
# install python-pip (aka pip)
git clone https://github.com/ianmiell/git-clone-reset-tutorial && cd git-clone-reset-tutorial
./run.sh
```

and follow the instructions.
